metadata.title: Oceanographic Investigations in the Northern Bering Sea and Bering Strait
metadata.description: Oceanographic data collected on 79 stations in the northern Bering and Bering Strait during 8-19 July 1968 are presented and interpreted.  The data include observations of the temperature, salinity dissolved oxygen and current velocity made at 5-meter intervals from sea surface to the bottom, Contoured sections of the data are also presented.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: To report on oceanographic Investigations in the Northern Bering Sea and Bering Strait, done by the US Coast Guard in 1968.

Status: Complete

Maintenance frequency: None Planned
